name: Deep Water and Dim Light
description:
Title: Deep Water and Dim Lights

Platform: Browser

Genre: Text Adventure Game

Rating: E10+

Target Market: Ages 10+, casual gamers 

Game Overview:
You are an underwater welder. While you are conducting normal maintenance, you lose power to all of your equipment. You now must find your way back into the station to restart the generator.

Instructions: 
Play in Browser

Game Design Team 

Zachery Adams – Game Designer
